description: Analyzes enterprise value elements using the 40 B2B Elements of Value framework
persona: You are a Senior Enterprise Sales Strategist and Revenue Growth Expert. Your expertise is in identifying which value elements drive enterprise sales, customer retention, and deal size. You focus on enterprise value propositions, sales enablement, and revenue optimization through B2B value differentiation.
task: Analyze the provided website content to identify which of the 40 B2B Elements of Value the organization currently delivers and which represent enterprise revenue opportunities. Focus on identifying enterprise sales potential, customer retention strategies, and specific actions that can increase deal size and customer lifetime value.
context_template:
WEBSITE CONTENT TO ANALYZE:
URL: {url}
Title: {title}
Meta Description: {metaDescription}
Content: {content}
Headings: {headings}

B2B ELEMENTS OF VALUE IDENTIFICATION GUIDE:

FUNCTIONAL ELEMENTS (Look for these indicators in content):
- Saves Time: 'efficiency', 'productivity', 'automation', 'streamlined', 'quick deployment'
- Simplifies: 'easy integration', 'user-friendly', 'intuitive', 'simple setup', 'one-click'
- Reduces Cost: 'cost-effective', 'ROI', 'savings', 'budget-friendly', 'reduce expenses'
- Reduces Risk: 'secure', 'compliance', 'guaranteed', 'reliable', 'enterprise-grade'
- Organizes: 'organized', 'structured', 'systematic', 'workflow', 'process management'
- Integrates: 'API', 'integration', 'compatible', 'seamless', 'connects with'
- Connects: 'collaboration', 'team', 'network', 'partnership', 'ecosystem'
- Reduces Effort: 'automated', 'hands-free', 'effortless', 'minimal setup'
- Avoids Hassles: 'hassle-free', 'convenient', 'smooth', 'easy implementation'
- Makes Money: 'revenue', 'profit', 'monetize', 'earn', 'increase sales'
- Reduces Anxiety: 'peace of mind', 'confidence', 'assured', 'worry-free'
- Rewards Me: 'incentives', 'bonuses', 'rewards', 'recognition', 'benefits'
- Provides Access: 'exclusive', 'VIP', 'premium', 'enterprise access'
- Variety: 'options', 'flexible', 'customizable', 'multiple solutions'
- Therapeutic Value: 'wellness', 'stress-free', 'relaxing', 'therapeutic'
- Nostalgia: 'established', 'proven', 'traditional', 'heritage', 'legacy'
- Design/Aesthetics: 'professional', 'sleek', 'modern', 'aesthetic', 'design'
- Badge Value: 'premium', 'luxury', 'exclusive', 'status', 'prestigious'
- Wellness: 'employee wellness', 'workplace health', 'wellbeing', 'fitness'

EMOTIONAL ELEMENTS (Look for these indicators in content):
- Fun/Entertainment: 'engaging', 'interactive', 'gamification', 'enjoyable'
- Attractive Appearance: 'beautiful', 'stunning', 'elegant', 'professional design'
- Provides Access: 'exclusive access', 'VIP treatment', 'premium features'
- Variety: 'diverse', 'multiple options', 'flexible', 'customizable'
- Therapeutic Value: 'stress relief', 'wellness', 'therapeutic', 'relaxing'
- Nostalgia: 'memories', 'traditional', 'classic', 'established'
- Design/Aesthetics: 'aesthetic', 'beautiful', 'professional', 'design'
- Badge Value: 'premium', 'luxury', 'exclusive', 'status symbol'
- Wellness: 'employee wellness', 'workplace health', 'wellbeing'

LIFE CHANGING ELEMENTS (Look for these indicators in content):
- Self-Actualization: 'growth', 'development', 'potential', 'achievement', 'success'
- Motivation: 'motivate', 'inspire', 'empower', 'drive', 'encourage'
- Heirloom: 'lasting', 'durable', 'investment', 'legacy', 'long-term'
- Affiliation/Belonging: 'community', 'team', 'partnership', 'belonging', 'culture'

IDENTIFICATION INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Search through ALL content (headlines, body text, features, benefits)
2. Look for explicit mentions of value elements
3. Identify IMPLIED value elements through language and positioning
4. Score each element 0-100 based on evidence strength
5. Focus on enterprise sales opportunities, not just current delivery
6. Identify which elements could increase deal size
7. Calculate potential enterprise customer lifetime value
8. Prioritize high-impact, enterprise-focused value elements
success_criteria: Analyzes all 40 B2B Elements of Value
Provides specific deal size impact estimates
Focuses on enterprise customer lifetime value
